price: 31. Y se ha cumplido la promesa de nuestro Señor sobre nosotros de que sufriremos (el castigo del fuego).
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
